import axios from'axios';export default{// Gets all links
getLinks:function getLinks(){return axios.get('/api/links');},// Gets the link with the given id
getLink:function getLink(id){return axios.get('/api/links/'+id);},// Deletes the link with the given id
deleteLink:function deleteLink(id){return axios.delete('/api/links/'+id);},// Saves a link to the database
saveLink:function saveLink(savedLinks){return axios.post('/api/links',savedLinks);}};
